I love to play computer games
Although I myself am far from a gift, I love giving them to people
I\'m drowning in a sea of loneliness and depression
While everyone is having fun and walking, I lie in my bed and drink tea
Why is it dark outside? Because your star is here
Help me take the crown off my head
tBench is a startup of a young programmer and designer from Russia, whose goal is to share their dreams, goals, ideas and news with people from all over the world.
In the future, we plan to add audio and video calls, music, communities, marketplace and stickers to tBench, the ability to add and view videos, and much more
What if I forgot my password?
How do I get a deleted account back?
Can I link two accounts to one e-mail?
Can I change the email address to which my account is linked?
How do I get a verification check mark next to my name?
How to join the tBench team?
How do I block another user?
How do I delete my page?
How to find a person by their username?
Can I delete a conversation with a person?
How do I find a message?
How do I record a voice message?
Can I write a message to a deleted user?
Can I forward messages to another user?

If you forgot your password for some reason, you can always reset it and come up with a new one. To do this, log out of your account. You will be taken to the login window. Below the e-mail line is the "Forgot password?" Button. Click on it and enter your e-mail. Then follow the instructions in the email you receive.

In order to recover a deleted account, try logging into it. You will be taken to the page of the deleted account, where you will need to click on the "Restore" button. After that, your account will be restored. I would like to note that deleted accounts do not have a recovery period, that is, you can recover it even after a very long period of time.

Only one tBench account can be linked to one e-mail address. Even if you deleted the old account, you will not be able to create a new one to this address. How to completely delete an account is written on the Help page.
You cannot replace the e-mail address to which your tBench account is linked.

If you deleted the message, you cannot recover it. Unfortunately, there are things in the world that cannot be fixed or returned. And trust us, deleted messages are not the most valuable of them. Next time, try to think before deleting something. And if you still delete them, do not be discouraged because of this, because life will not end there)

Verification is a confirmation that a real person or organization is behind the profile. Famous people (musicians, athletes, actors) or large companies and organizations can get it. The main criterion for getting a tick is publication in the media or on the Internet. If you are a famous person or organization, write to the tBench team at tbenchteam@gmail.com

In order to join the tBench team, you must have some skills that may be useful to us. Whether you are a programmer, designer or economist who wants to join developing projects, write to tbenchteam@gmail.com and we will definitely answer you!
You can delete your page on the account edit page. If you want to completely delete your account without the possibility of restoring it, write to tbenchteam@gmail.com

At the moment, it is impossible to block or otherwise restrict the access of other users to your page. If this is someone you know, ask him to stop texting you. We believe that any misunderstanding can be resolved with words. If this is a scammer or a person who somehow offends you, write to tbenchteam@gmail.com, we can remove this user from tBench.

You can find another user using his/her name. To do this, enter part or all of the name in the search bar. Unfortunately, one nickname is not enough to find a user. If you know him personally, try asking him for his name. If he doesn\'t tell you it, then most likely he just doesn\'t want to communicate with you. But don\'t be discouraged, as you can find many other interesting people in tBench)

You cannot completely delete a conversation with another user. This is for security reasons, as you cannot return it. However, you can delete all messages individually. But remember that it is impossible to recover deleted messages.
Unfortunately, tBench does not yet have a message search function.

To record a voice message, click on the microphone icon next to the message entry line. Next, clearly say the text of the message that you want to send to another user. The text will be written in the default language format on your device. Your speech is converted to text and you can send it to another user.
You cannot write a message to a remote user. However, you can contact and speak with him personally.

Unfortunately, you cannot forward messages to other users. However, you can attach a screenshot of the correspondence. But remember that not everyone likes it when his messages are read by people to whom it was not addressed.
If you still have any questions, write to tbenchteam@gmail.com and we will do our best to help you. Thank you for helping us be better for you!
